trans-unit.source: File storage, which acts as an entry root point to a file-based structure. See it like a drive or a hard drive volume in your local machine.
trans-unit.target: Stockage de fichiers, qui agit comme un point d'entrée vers une structure basée sur des fichiers. Voyez-le comme un lecteur ou un volume de disque dur sur votre ordinateur local.

trans-unit.source: This description field is used to explain e.g. the location of the storage, also what this storage is meant for or what it contains.
trans-unit.target: Ce champ de description est utilisé pour expliquer, par exemple, l'emplacement du stockage, également ce à quoi ce stockage est destiné ou ce qu'il contient.

trans-unit.source: Choose the driver as the technical backbone of the storage. Once you've chosen a driver, and saved it, additional configuration will show up.

The driver is the technical background of a storage, and thus also defines whether the location of the storage is local (= on the same machine as this TYPO3 installation) or remote like a WebDAV server connection. Search for extensions in the TYPO3 Extension Repository that extend this driver list.
Disabling the storage will result in removing it from any listings in the backend. Existing file relations will still exist.
trans-unit.target: Désactiver le stockage aura pour résultat de le supprimer de toutes les listes dans le backend. Les relations de fichiers existantes, existeront toujours.

trans-unit.source: If you set up a file storage, it will show up on any folder lists, thus allowing to basically browse through the files in this file repository. If you set this checkbox, this storage will be excluded from any listings in the backend. Any existing file references will still exist further.
trans-unit.target: Si vous configurez un stockage de fichiers, celui-ci apparaîtra sur toutes les listes de dossiers, permettant ainsi de parcourir les fichiers de ce référentiel de fichiers. Si vous cochez cette case, cet espace de stockage sera exclu de toute liste du backend. Toute référence de fichier existante, existera toujours.

trans-unit.source: If set, backend users can browse through this storage. Otherwise it will show up as a unselectable item in the list.

This flag is usually set. If TYPO3 cannot connect to this storage (because it maybe temporary down), then the flag will be checked, and the storage will behave like it is non-browsable in the TYPO3 backend. The admin needs to manually activate it again if it was offline.
If set, then the files in this storage can be linked directly from the outside world. If this is not set, make sure to provide additional possibilities to access the files in this storage.
If set, then users are allowed to modify, add, delete files/folders on this storage.
The visible identifier for this file storage.
trans-unit.target: L'identifiant visible pour ce stockage de fichier.

trans-unit.source: The label entered here will be shown as the name for the entry point in the TYPO3 Backend. Be sure to make it descriptive and logical for your editors.
trans-unit.target: L'étiquette entrée ici sera affichée comme nom du point d'entrée dans le backend TYPO3. Assurez-vous de le rendre compréhensible et logique pour vos éditeurs.

trans-unit.source: Defines the directory on this storage to be used to save temporary files like resized images.
